data.stage-1-end-to-end-machine-learning#Stag:
The primary goal is to learn the complete modeling process, with secondary goals of understanding common machine learning algorithms (their advantages, disadvantages, principles, steps, applications) and learning modeling tools (Sklearn \ scikit-learn), in order to quickly become familiar with end-to-end modeling. Practice with multiple cases to become familiar with the end-to-end modeling process. Main topics include:
Understand related concepts such as Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and Statistical Machine Learning; Learn the principles of common algorithms. Focus on understanding their advantages, disadvantages, principles, steps, and applications without delving too deeply into mathematical formulas; Learn the step-by-step modeling process, e.g., CRISP-DM; Learn modeling tools, e.g., scikit-learn; Practice on small datasets, e.g., the UC Irvine Machine Learning Repository; Deploy serialized or packaged models as a Flask API or Streamlit\Gradio application; Supplementary Content:
Learn about Automated Machine Learning (AutoML) tools. Learn about Python libraries for handling large datasets. Recommended Reading:
Deep Learning: From Basics to Practice (Volume 1) - [US] Andrew Glassner Machine Learning with Python Cookbook - Chris Albon Machine Learning Mastery with Python - Jason Brownlee Sklearn Tutorials (by Caicai) Hands-On Machine Learning with Scikit-Learn, Keras, and TensorFlow - (FR) Aur√©lien G√©ron Python Machine Learning - (US) Sebastian Raschka, (US) Vahid Mirjalili
